entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
